resources.string: Sprints represent a daily effort to do great things. Set ambitious goals and work to achieve more throughout the day!
Hint: Didn\'t quite hit the mark? Edit a Sprint to reset its due date.

Tasks represent a backlog of responsibilities and scheduled events. Never forget anything again! Examples include doctor appointments, filing your taxes, and finishing an essay. Hint: Seem like too much to tackle? Nest multiple tasks inside of a goal to make tasks less daunting.
